Add new device to user group: Add new device to user group
set-time-label: Set a time during which the network will be disabled.
set-time-label-kids: Specify the exact timeframe and days for the network deactivation.
identify-room-label: This name will be used to identify and manage the room.
add-multiple-rooms-label: To add multiple rooms at once, please contact
good-network-label: The network is running as expected and connection is good.
password-works-single: Password works for this device only.
find-license-key-label: You can find your license key in the quick start guide.
password-restrict-label: min. 8 characters, mixed case, numbers & letters
id-created-devices-label: If you have your devices with you, you’re now ready to set up your network.
get-feedback: We are early in our journey and happy to get your feedback and wishes. Reach out any time!
initialization-view-option-label: Set up your network or explore our app in a demo setting.
log-in-label: Log in or create a new account.
valid-email-label: Please enter a valid email address.
delete-account-message: To delete your account, please get in touch
incorrect-code: Code incorrect! Click to send again
network-room-wifi-premium: People can access the premium WiFi by scanning the code in their room.
name-device-label: Name the device and select the network to add it to.
user-name-label: This name will be used to identify and manage the user.
unique-link-user-device: We send each user a unique link that let’s them connect their devices.
set-connected-device-cable: Set which network devices connected via cable will connect to.
reboot-label: During reboot, all connected devices will be offline.
get-alerts: Get alerts directly on your phone.
send-email-responsible-label: Send an email to whoever is responsible.
demo-airzen-wife-memo: AirZen is WiFi for when it really matters. You can try out different setups here, all without owning the routers yet.
node-code-location: You can find the code on the bottom of your node.
accept-terms: I accept the terms and conditions to receive messages from our service live-chat in the app.
guest-scan: Let guests scan the code or connect to their devices to the network manually.
room-premium-label: Put this code into the newly created room. Users scan the code in order to add a wifi device.
connected-devices-warning: Connected devices will be cleared from rooms every two weeks.
use-link-label: can use the link to connect their devices to the Team network.
service-key-label: Enter your Service Key to get started.
find-service-key: You can find your Service Key in the quick start guide.
service-key-warning: For network security, you’ll be asked to enter the service key every 30 days or when switching devices.
invalid-number-warning: Phone number is not in a valida format. example
secure-2fa-hint: Using a second factor for authentication secures your account from unwanted access.
add-license-key-label: To start, add your license key to authenticate your nodes.
smart-devices-label: Smart devices is a pre-created user group and can’t be deleted.
delete-user-devices-warning-label: If you delete a user all of their connected devices will be removed from the network.
Name: Name
install-nodes-label-1: Your Nodes came in a set of 3. We’ll guide you through set up one by one.
install-nodes-label-2: Scan the QR code on the bottom of one of the nodes to make it your primary node.
install-nodes-label-3: Once your nodes are installed you’re ready to bring your devices online.
setup-node-label-1: Connect to your modem via ethernet cable.
finish-node-setup-label-1: Great! You’re nodes are installed and running as expected.
finish-node-setup-label-2: You’re ready to bring your home online!
setup-auth-label-1: Copy the code below into the Authenticator App and enter the 8 digits here.
setup-auth-label-2: You can download an authenticator app (e.g. Authy) from the App Store.
kidsafe-dasboard-label: If you have any questions, our team is available to you via the support chat at any time.
add-child-network-label: For children under 10 years old, we recommend "Kids Wifi". You can manage both networks independently of each other.
network-pause-label-1: Pause internet usage individually for a specific period of time.
network-pause-label-2: When the pause is over, you will be notified by a signal tone that internet usage is available again.
The internet will be paused for: The internet will be paused for
countdown-label-1: Pause internet usage after the countdown expires.
countdown-label-2: From when should the selected children be paused?
countdown-label-3: Play a sound at the beginning.
countdown-label-4: Once the countdown expires, a signal tone will sound to inform you about the start of the internet break.
app-lock-label-2: Access to these apps will no longer be possible for the corresponding network.
network-kids-schedule-label-2: During these times, the WiFi switches to airplane mode.
network-schedule-label-1: Please specify the time periods during which you want the internet to be available. Outside of those times, the WiFi network will not be visible and will be disabled on the router.
network-schedule-label-2: the selected network will not be available, and the router's wireless module will not broadcast the network. This reduces the Wi-Fi radiation in your home during the break.
network-limit-label-2: If the limit is exceeded, internet access will be paused for the remainder of the day.
webfilter-label-2: Filters content and websites that are considered unsafe for young children.
new-device-name-label: In the next step, you will add the WiFi device. Make sure you have the device with you and enter the password within the next 10 minutes. Repeat this process for each additional device.
schedule-sales: To schedule an appointment with sales
no-connection: The network has no connection to the internet.
talk-to-us: Questions? Talk to us in the chat.
restart-label: During the restart, all connected devices will be offline.
Live demo of additional AirZen products: Live demo of additional AirZen products
The internet is paused for all children: The internet is paused for all children
The internet is paused for all kids: The internet is paused for all kids
The internet is paused for all teenagers: The internet is paused for all teenagers
The internet will be paused for all chil: The internet will be paused for all children shortly
The internet will be paused for all kids: The internet will be paused for all kids shortly
The internet will be paused for all teen: The internet will be paused for all teenagers shortly
lock-with-code: Lock app access with a numerical code, for example, your birthday.
app-code-label: Please enter your code to unlock the app
add new adult label: Invite another person to manage your AirZen Kids account - they will have the same permissions to add or remove children and devices.
send link label: We will send the invitation to the provided email address. The person needs to create an AirZen profile using this link to access the account. Alternatively, you can copy the following link
network-rename-warning: When renaming the network, all children and devices will be automatically deleted and must be re-added. Unfortunately, this is unavoidable due to technical reasons.
disable-network-warning: Only use this function if you don't have a child within the age range of this network.
refer-label-1: Recommend AirZen to others and secure a bonus payment
refer-label-2: New customers save 10% of the purchase amount with your recommendation. You will receive this 10% as a bonus payment to your account.
refer-switch-label: I accept the general terms and conditions of the AirZen referral marketing.
refer-label-3: The AirZen bonus code will be sent to this email address. After completing the order and the expiration of the return period, you will receive the bonus payment.
refer-label-4: Be your own boss - become an AirZen partner!
refer-label-5: Many AirZen partners use our technology to run their own businesses. If you are interested in being your own boss, visit our partner portal.
Instructions-label-1: Extend the network coverage for your kids & teenagers by adding additional AirZen Nodes.
Instructions-label-2: All Nodes must be connected to your provider's network via Ethernet cables. If Ethernet cables are not available, Powerline adapters provide a solution to extend the provider's network through the electrical outlets of your home.
